datafield.subfield: Influence of surface tension on nuclear collective properties

Rigidities of even-even nuclei were estimated and compared with nuclear charge radii. Correlation of maximal nuclear rigidities with minimal values of r$_{0}$ parameters was revealed. Influence of effective surface tension on nuclear properties was discussed
